lead_paragraph: Super Bowl MVP Von Miller's camp has rejected a contract proposal that would have made him the highest-paid non-quarterback in NFL history, a person familiar with the matter told The Associated Press on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: AP Source: Miller Rejects $114.5 Million Offer
headline.main: AP Source: Miller Rejects $114.5 Million Offer
